articles.title: Elon Musk broke law with threat to Tesla workers' stock options, court rules - The Guardian
articles.description: Appeal judges uphold previous ruling, citing ‘implied threat’ in CEO’s tweet directed at Fremont employees who wanted to join union
articles.content:
A US appeals court has ruled that Elon Musk violated federal labour law by tweeting that employees of Tesla would lose stock options if they joined a union.
